Wes, you should see a method called clearInteractionHistory on
InteractionEventLogger, if you don't something is not synched.  Could you try to
synch everything, run the tests again, and list any tests that fail?
Synchronized again and seem to have picked up updates. Fixed.

That test only fails if the new test you added (TaskDataExportTest) is in the
suite.  Please make sure to runn all tests after adding any tests in order to
find these problems early.  Each test should clean up after itself (which yours
probably does) but there can still be wierd resource-related dependencies
between tests (which are my problem and I'm trying to fix that now).  Comments
related to this will be on the export report.
